title: What can I do if the  USB device that is connected to the terminal does not work?
answer:
Step 1:Check the USB indicator of the terminal.
If it is off, remove and then re-insert the USB device (if a USB extension cable is used, replace the cable). Ensure that the USB device is properly connected to the terminal.
Step 2:If the problem persists, connect the USB device to another device (for example, connect the USB memory to the USB port of a computer) to check whether the USB device is faulty.
Replace the USB device if it is faulty.
If the problem persists, contact an authorized maintenance center to check whether the terminal is faulty.
